Returns: True if seek is enabled without @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackSeekDataProvider_E@, false otherwise.

onDetachedFromHost().Description: This method is called when current associated @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlueHost_E@ is attached to a different @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlue_E@ or @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlueHost_E@ is destroyed . Subclass may override and call super.onDetachedFromHost() at last. A typical PlaybackGlue will release resources (e.g. MediaPlayer or connection to playback service) in this method.

Parameters: boolean: True to enable seek, false otherwise
setSeekEnabled(boolean).Description: Enable or disable seek when @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackTransportControlGlue#getSeekProvider_E@ is null. When true, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlayerAdapter#seekTo_E@ will be called during user seeking.

Returns: Seek data provider used during user seeking.
getSeekProvider().Description: Get seek data provider used during user seeking.

ClassDesc: A helper class for managing a @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackControlsRow_E@ being displayed in @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlueHost_E@, it supports standard playback control actions play/pause, and skip next/previous. This helper class is a glue layer in that manages interaction between the leanback UI components @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackControlsRow_E@ @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackTransportRowPresenter_E@ and a functional @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlayerAdapter_E@ which represents the underlying media player. App must pass a @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlayerAdapter_E@ in constructor for a specific implementation e.g. a @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#MediaPlayerAdapter_E@. The glue has two actions bar: primary actions bar and secondary actions bar. App can provide additional actions by overriding @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackTransportControlGlue#onCreatePrimaryActions_E@ and / or @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackBaseControlGlue#onCreateSecondaryActions_E@ and respond to actions by override @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackTransportControlGlue#onActionClicked_E@. It's also subclass's responsibility to implement the "repeat mode" in @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackBaseControlGlue#onPlayCompleted_E@. Apps calls @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackTransportControlGlue#setSeekProvider_E@ to provide seek data. If the @B_android#support#v17#leanback#media#PlaybackGlueHost_E@ is instance of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PlaybackSeekUi_E@, the provider will be passed to PlaybackGlueHost to render thumb bitmaps.
